Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball finished with 34 points, eight rebounds, and 11 assists.
The Hornets were down by as many as 18 points in the second half but came back to win.
LaMelo Ball scored 12 of his 34 points in the fourth quarter.
Tre Mann contributed 24 points off the bench.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball emphasized the importance of setting a tone in the first game.
Charles Lee secured his first win as the Hornets head coach.
LaMelo Ball described the win as a blessing and highlighted the importance of competing and playing both sides of the ball.
Charles Lee described LaMelo Ball as the 'engine' for the team.
